title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, May 27, 2022
description: It’s the birthday of the American poet who once said, “The public needs poetry; I need poetry, to help celebrate and console.” Linda Pastan, born in 1932.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of the American poet who once said, “The public needs poetry; I need poetry, to help celebrate and console.” Linda Pastan, born in 1932.
